Message.TypeName: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Message.Issue: Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'value' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "X и Y неравны".
Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'value' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "X и Y неравны".
Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'value' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "X и Y равны".
Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'value' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "X и Y равны".

Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'value' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "Преобразование объекта в строку ".

Message.TypeName: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Message.Issue: Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'format' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string, object)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "Расстояние от точки до центра координат = {0:.####}".

Message.TypeName: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Message.Issue: Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'format' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string, object, object)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "Координаты точки:\n x = {0}\n y = {1}".

Method 'Class1.Main()' passes a literal string as parameter 'format' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string, object, object)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "Координаты точки:\n x = {0}\n y = {1}".

Message.TypeName: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Message.Issue: Method 'Point.Print()' passes a literal string as parameter 'format' of a call to 'Console.WriteLine(string, object, object)'. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: "Координаты точки:\n x = {0}\n y = {1}".

Rule.TypeName: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Rule.Name: Do not pass literals as localized parameters
Rule.Description: Literal strings that are embedded in source code are difficult to localize. Avoid passing literal strings as arguments in circumstances where a localized string is generally expected.
Rule.Resolution: Method {0} passes a literal string as parameter '{1}' of a call to {2}. Retrieve the following string(s) from a resource table instead: {3}.
